info.name: online-shop API
info.description: This is a sample API documentation for Online-Shop

request.description:
# Get Products

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of products.

### Request Description

- Method: GET
    
- URL: [http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/)
    

### Response

- Status Code: 200
    
- Content Type: application/json

response.name: product_list_sample
response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Adizero ZG Spikeless Golf Shoes",
        "description": "Spikeless golf shoes made in part with a blend of recycled and renewable materials.\\r\\nChase your low score with these Adizero ZG Spikeless Golf Shoes from adidas. Lightweight yet packed with tech, they feature ultralight Lightstrike Pro cushioning to support focused play, and a dynamic stability system for confident footing on greens and fairways. The waterproof upper keeps your feet dry in damp conditions.",
        "price": "180.00",
        "category": 2,
        "main_image": "https://assets.adidas.com/images/w_85,h_85,f_auto,q_auto,fl_lossy,c_fill,g_auto/b9e107f5ef3543a08cf0905c0f769416_9366/adizero-zg-spikeless-golf-shoes.jpg",

request.description:
# Get Product by ID

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve product details based on the provided ID.

#### Request Parameters

- `id` (query parameter) - The ID of the product to retrieve.
    

### Request Description

- Method: GET
    
- URL: [http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/prodicts/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/)
    

### Response

- Status Code: 200
    
- Content Type: application/json
    

Example response:

``` json
[
    {
        "id": 0,
        "name": "",
        "description": "",
        "price": "",
        "category": 0,
        "main_image": "",
        "type_sport": "",
        "images": [""],
        "quantity": 0,
        "is_active": true
    }
]

 ```

response.name: show_products_byID
response.body:

request.description:
# Get Product by Category

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve product details based on the provided id of category.

#### Request Parameters

- `id` (query parameter) - The ID of the category to retrieve.
    

### Request Description

- Method: GET
    
- URL: [http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/categories/1/products](http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/)
    

### Response

- Status Code: 200
    
- Content Type: application/json

request.description:
# Get Categories

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve a list of categories.

### Request Description

- Method: GET
    
- URL: [http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/categories/](http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/)
    

### Response

- Status Code: 200
    
- Content Type: application/json
    

``` json
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Football"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Golf"
  {
]

 ```

# Get Category by ID

This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to retrieve category details based on the provided ID.

#### Request Parameters

- `id` (query parameter) - The ID of the product to retrieve.
    

### Request Description

- Method: GET
    
- URL: [http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/categories/?id=3](http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products/)
    

### Response

- Status Code: 200
    
- Content Type: application/json
    

Example response:

``` json
{
    "id": 3,
    "name": "Volleyball"
}

 ```

item.name: Auth

request.description:
# Login User

This endpoint allows the user to log in by sending a POST request to the specified URL.

### Request Body

- email (string): The email of the user.
    
- password (string): The password of the user.
    

### Response

The response will be in JSON format with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "token": "string"
}

 ```

# Get User

This endpoint retrieves user information.

#### Request Body

- Authorization (string, required): The authorization token.
    

#### Response

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "id": 22,
    "email": "d@mail.ru",
    "first_name": "Damir",
    "last_name": "Smetov"
}

 ```

# Logout User

This endpoint is used to log out the user from the system.

**Request Body**

- No request body is required for this endpoint.
    

**Response**

- Status: 200 OK
    
- Content Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "message": "User logged out successfully"
}

 ```
